argumentText:
ARGUMENT
a

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | dstrvprob.1 | |- ( ph -> P e. Prob ) |
| 2 |  | dstrvprob.2 | |- ( ph -> X e. ( rRndVar ` P ) ) |
| 3 |  | orvcelel.1 | |- ( ph -> A e. BrSiga ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_orvcelval | |- ( ph -> ( X oRVC _E A ) = ( `' X " A ) ) |
| 5 | 1, 2 | #P_rrvfinvima | |- ( ph -> A. a e. BrSiga ( `' X " a ) e. dom P ) |
| 6 |  | #P_simpr | |- ( ( ph /\ a = A ) -> a = A ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_imaeq2d | |- ( ( ph /\ a = A ) -> ( `' X " a ) = ( `' X " A ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( ( ph /\ a = A ) -> ( ( `' X " a ) e. dom P <-> ( `' X " A ) e. dom P ) ) |
| 9 | 3, 8 | #P_rspcdv | |- ( ph -> ( A. a e. BrSiga ( `' X " a ) e. dom P -> ( `' X " A ) e. dom P ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_mpd | |- ( ph -> ( `' X " A ) e. dom P ) |
| 11 | 4, 10 | #P_eqeltrd | |- ( ph -> ( X oRVC _E A ) e. dom P ) |
